summary:
In human language his name is Winged Snow Hunter
heh yeah right
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80533-0-1480358977.jpg[/img]
The reason why i made this is because that in his human name he would be called Winged [b][u]Snow[/u][/b] Hunter.
And lets face it he doesnt really live up to his name.
So now i made a new version of him where is looks a lot more  like a [b]Cold[/b] killer :P

I really dont know why bethesda would make him red and purple? , but now I have fixed it.

I enhanced/remade
Odahviing's teeth, tongue mouth and eye (which is probaly HD now)
And of course i remade his scales/skin so he looks cold/cool


Dont forget to check out my other mods
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77975-0-1480359395.jpg[/img]
